name: Shackles of Ellswyn
description:
Shackles of Ellswyn is a fantasy fetish Visual Novel where you follow the main characters journey as they are lost in a realm of dominant futanari. You can choose who you will end up a slave to, as you try and explore the realm and rescue your best friend who is suffering a similar fate.
Shackles of Ellswyn features three main plotlines where you follow along the story of one of each of the futanari; The Queen, The Warrior and The Witch. Each storyline has several gorgeous erotic art pieces depicting the situations you end up in, which you can unlock to view later in a gallery.
Featuring a completely unique soundtrack, Voice Acting, toggleable JOI, and a Chastity Roulette: the game's focus is to have you completely immersed in this new world.
